message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000.  Inflation will only make us both poorer if we wait.
I'm going for a bigger share this time.  Inflation is going to hurt Alice more than me, so I'm taking advantage of that. Let's see if you'll agree to this, Alice.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day before we both lose even more to inflation.
